verses.verse: Again the word <WH1697> of the YY <WH3068> came unto me, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,
Son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, cause Yerushalayim <WH3389> to know <WH3045> <WH8685> her abominations <WH8441>,

And say <WH559> <WH8804>, Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069> unto Yerushalayim <WH3389>; Thy birth <WH4351> and thy nativity <WH4138> is of the land <WH776> of Kanahan <WH3669>; thy father <WH1> was an Amorite <WH567>, and thy mother <WH517> an Hittite <WH2850>.

And as for thy nativity <WH4138>, in the day <WH3117> thou wast born <WH3205> <WH8715> thy navel <WH8270> was not cut <WH3772> <WH8795>, neither wast thou washed <WH7364> <WH8795> in water <WH4325> to supple <WH4935> thee; thou wast not salted <WH4414> <WH8717> at all <WH4414> <WH8715>, nor swaddled <WH2853> <WH8795> at all <WH2853> <WH8715>.

None eye <WH5869> pitied <WH2347> <WH8804> thee, to do <WH6213> <WH8800> any <WH259> of these unto thee, to have compassion <WH2550> <WH8800> upon thee; but thou wast cast out <WH7993> <WH8714> in the open <WH6440> field <WH7704>, to the lothing <WH1604> of thy person <WH5315>, in the day <WH3117> that thou wast born <WH3205> <WH8715>.

And when I passed <WH5674> <WH8799> by thee, and saw <WH7200> <WH8799> thee polluted <WH947> <WH8711> in thine own blood <WH1818>, I said <WH559> <WH8799> unto thee when thou wast in thy blood <WH1818>, Live <WH2421> <WH8798>; yea, I said <WH559> <WH8799> unto thee when thou wast in thy blood <WH1818>, Live <WH2421> <WH8798>.

I have caused <WH5414> <WH8804> thee to multiply <WH7233> as the bud <WH6780> of the field <WH7704>, and thou hast increased <WH7235> <WH8799> and waxen great <WH1431> <WH8799>, and thou art come <WH935> <WH8799> to excellent <WH5716> ornaments <WH5716>: thy breasts <WH7699> are fashioned <WH3559> <WH8738>, and thine hair <WH8181> is grown <WH6779> <WH8765>, whereas thou wast naked <WH5903> and bare <WH6181>.

Now when I passed <WH5674> <WH8799> by thee, and looked <WH7200> <WH8799> upon thee, behold, thy time <WH6256> was the time <WH6256> of love <WH1730>; and I spread <WH6566> <WH8799> my skirt <WH3671> over thee, and covered <WH3680> <WH8762> thy nakedness <WH6172>: yea, I sware <WH7650> <WH8735> unto thee, and entered <WH935> <WH8799> into a covenant <WH1285> with thee, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>, and thou becamest mine.
Then washed <WH7364> <WH8799> I thee with water <WH4325>; yea, I throughly washed away <WH7857> <WH8799> thy blood <WH1818> from thee, and I anointed <WH5480> <WH8799> thee with oil <WH8081>.

I clothed <WH3847> <WH8686> thee also with broidered work <WH7553>, and shod <WH5274> <WH8799> thee with badgers' skin <WH8476>, and I girded <WH2280> <WH8799> thee about with fine linen <WH8336>, and I covered <WH3680> <WH8762> thee with silk <WH4897>.
I decked <WH5710> <WH8799> thee also with ornaments <WH5716>, and I put <WH5414> <WH8799> bracelets <WH6781> upon thy hands <WH3027>, and a chain <WH7242> on thy neck <WH1627>.
And I put <WH5414> <WH8799> a jewel <WH5141> on thy forehead <WH639>, and earrings <WH5694> in thine ears <WH241>, and a beautiful <WH8597> crown <WH5850> upon thine head <WH7218>.

Thus wast thou decked <WH5710> <WH8799> with gold <WH2091> and silver <WH3701>; and thy raiment <WH4403> was of fine linen <WH8336> <WH8675> <WH8336>, and silk <WH4897>, and broidered work <WH7553>; thou didst eat <WH398> <WH8804> fine flour <WH5560>, and honey <WH1706>, and oil <WH8081>: and thou wast exceeding <WH3966> beautiful <WH3302> <WH8799>, and thou didst prosper <WH6743> <WH8799> into a kingdom <WH4410>.

And thy renown <WH8034> went forth <WH3318> <WH8799> among the heathen <WH1471> for thy beauty <WH3308>: for it was perfect <WH3632> through my comeliness <WH1926>, which I had put <WH7760> <WH8804> upon thee, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>.

But thou didst trust <WH982> <WH8799> in thine own beauty <WH3308>, and playedst the harlot <WH2181> <WH8799> because of thy renown <WH8034>, and pouredst out <WH8210> <WH8799> thy fornications <WH8457> on every one that passed by <WH5674> <WH8802>; his it was.

And of thy garments <WH899> thou didst take <WH3947> <WH8799>, and deckedst <WH6213> <WH8799> thy high places <WH1116> with divers colours <WH2921> <WH8803>, and playedst the harlot <WH2181> <WH8799> thereupon: the like things shall not come <WH935> <WH8802>, neither shall it be so.

Thou hast also taken <WH3947> <WH8799> thy fair <WH8597> jewels <WH3627> of my gold <WH2091> and of my silver <WH3701>, which I had given <WH5414> <WH8804> thee, and madest <WH6213> <WH8799> to thyself images <WH6754> of men <WH2145>, and didst commit whoredom <WH2181> <WH8799> with them,

And tookest <WH3947> <WH8799> thy broidered <WH7553> garments <WH899>, and coveredst <WH3680> <WH8762> them: and thou hast set <WH5414> <WH8804> mine oil <WH8081> and mine incense <WH7004> before <WH6440> them.

My meat <WH3899> also which I gave <WH5414> <WH8804> thee, fine flour <WH5560>, and oil <WH8081>, and honey <WH1706>, wherewith I fed <WH398> <WH8689> thee, thou hast even set <WH5414> <WH8804> it before <WH6440> them for a sweet <WH5207> savour <WH7381>: and thus it was, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>.

Moreover thou hast taken <WH3947> <WH8799> thy sons <WH1121> and thy daughters <WH1323>, whom thou hast borne <WH3205> <WH8804> unto me, and these hast thou sacrificed <WH2076> <WH8799> unto them to be devoured <WH398> <WH8800>. Is this of thy whoredoms <WH8457> a small matter <WH4592>,
That thou hast slain <WH7819> <WH8799> my children <WH1121>, and delivered <WH5414> <WH8799> them to cause them to pass through <WH5674> <WH8687> the fire for them?

And in all thine abominations <WH8441> and thy whoredoms <WH8457> thou hast not remembered <WH2142> <WH8804> the days <WH3117> of thy youth <WH5271>, when thou wast naked <WH5903> and bare <WH6181>, and wast polluted <WH947> <WH8711> in thy blood <WH1818>.
And it came to pass after <WH310> all thy wickedness <WH7451>, (woe <WH188>, woe <WH188> unto thee! saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>;)
That thou hast also built <WH1129> <WH8799> unto thee an eminent place <WH1354>, and hast made <WH6213> <WH8799> thee an high place <WH7413> in every street <WH7339>.

Thou hast built <WH1129> <WH8804> thy high place <WH7413> at every head <WH7218> of the way <WH1870>, and hast made thy beauty <WH3308> to be abhorred <WH8581> <WH8762>, and hast opened <WH6589> <WH8762> thy feet <WH7272> to every one that passed by <WH5674> <WH8802>, and multiplied <WH7235> <WH8686> thy whoredoms <WH8457>.

Thou hast also committed fornication <WH2181> <WH8799> with the Egyptians <WH1121> <WH4714> thy neighbours <WH7934>, great <WH1432> of flesh <WH1320>; and hast increased <WH7235> <WH8686> thy whoredoms <WH8457>, to provoke me to anger <WH3707> <WH8687>.

Behold, therefore I have stretched out <WH5186> <WH8804> my hand <WH3027> over thee, and have diminished <WH1639> <WH8799> thine ordinary <WH2706> food, and delivered <WH5414> <WH8799> thee unto the will <WH5315> of them that hate <WH8130> <WH8802> thee, the daughters <WH1323> of the Philistines <WH6430>, which are ashamed <WH3637> <WH8737> of thy lewd <WH2154> way <WH1870>.

Thou hast played the whore <WH2181> <WH8799> also with the Ashurns <WH1121> <WH804>, because <WH1115> thou wast unsatiable <WH7646> <WH8804>; yea, thou hast played the harlot <WH2181> <WH8799> with them, and yet couldest not be satisfied <WH7654>.

Thou hast moreover multiplied <WH7235> <WH8686> thy fornication <WH8457> in the land <WH776> of Kanahan <WH3667> unto Chaldea <WH3778>; and yet thou wast not satisfied <WH7646> <WH8804> herewith <WH2063>.

How weak <WH535> <WH8802> is thine heart <WH3826>, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>, seeing thou doest <WH6213> <WH8800> all these things, the work <WH4639> of an imperious <WH7986> whorish <WH2181> <WH8803> woman <WH802>;

In that thou buildest <WH1129> <WH8800> thine eminent place <WH1354> in the head <WH7218> of every way <WH1870>, and makest <WH6213> <WH8804> thine high place <WH7413> in every street <WH7339>; and hast not been as an harlot <WH2181> <WH8802>, in that thou scornest <WH7046> <WH8763> hire <WH868>;
But as a wife <WH802> that committeth adultery <WH5003> <WH8764>, which taketh <WH3947> <WH8799> strangers <WH2114> <WH8801> instead of her husband <WH376> !

They give <WH5414> <WH8799> gifts <WH5078> to all whores <WH2181> <WH8802>: but thou givest <WH5414> <WH8804> thy gifts <WH5083> to all thy lovers <WH157> <WH8764>, and hirest <WH7809> <WH8799> them, that they may come <WH935> <WH8800> unto thee on every side <WH5439> for thy whoredom <WH8457>.

And the contrary <WH2016> is in thee from other women <WH802> in thy whoredoms <WH8457>, whereas none followeth <WH310> thee to commit whoredoms <WH2181> <WH8795>: and in that thou givest <WH5414> <WH8800> a reward <WH868>, and no reward <WH868> is given <WH5414> <WH8738> unto thee, therefore thou art <WH1961> <WH8799> contrary <WH2016>.
Wherefore, O harlot <WH2181> <WH8802>, hear <WH8085> <WH8798> the word <WH1697> of the YY <WH3068>:

Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>; Because thy filthiness <WH5178> was poured out <WH8210> <WH8736>, and thy nakedness <WH6172> discovered <WH1540> <WH8735> through thy whoredoms <WH8457> with thy lovers <WH157> <WH8764>, and with all the idols <WH1544> of thy abominations <WH8441>, and by the blood <WH1818> of thy children <WH1121>, which thou didst give <WH5414> <WH8804> unto them;

Behold, therefore I will gather <WH6908> <WH8764> all thy lovers <WH157> <WH8764>, with whom thou hast taken pleasure <WH6149> <WH8804>, and all them that thou hast loved <WH157> <WH8804>, with all them that thou hast hated <WH8130> <WH8804>; I will even gather <WH6908> <WH8765> them round about <WH5439> against thee, and will discover <WH1540> <WH8765> thy nakedness <WH6172> unto them, that they may see <WH7200> <WH8804> all thy nakedness <WH6172>.

And I will judge <WH8199> <WH8804> thee, as women that break wedlock <WH5003> <WH8802> and shed <WH8210> <WH8802> blood <WH1818> are judged <WH4941>; and I will give <WH5414> <WH8804> thee blood <WH1818> in fury <WH2534> and jealousy <WH7068>.

And I will also give <WH5414> <WH8804> thee into their hand <WH3027>, and they shall throw down <WH2040> <WH8804> thine eminent place <WH1354>, and shall break down <WH5422> <WH8765> thy high places <WH7413>: they shall strip <WH6584> <WH8689> thee also of thy clothes <WH899>, and shall take <WH3947> <WH8804> thy fair <WH8597> jewels <WH3627>, and leave <WH3240> <WH8689> thee naked <WH5903> and bare <WH6181>.

They shall also bring up <WH5927> <WH8689> a company <WH6951> against thee, and they shall stone <WH7275> <WH8804> thee with stones <WH68>, and thrust thee through <WH1333> <WH8765> with their swords <WH2719>.

And they shall burn <WH8313> <WH8804> thine houses <WH1004> with fire <WH784>, and execute <WH6213> <WH8804> judgments <WH8201> upon thee in the sight <WH5869> of many <WH7227> women <WH802>: and I will cause thee to cease <WH7673> <WH8689> from playing the harlot <WH2181> <WH8802>, and thou also shalt give <WH5414> <WH8799> no hire <WH868> any more.

So will I make my fury <WH2534> toward thee to rest <WH5117> <WH8689>, and my jealousy <WH7068> shall depart <WH5493> <WH8804> from thee, and I will be quiet <WH8252> <WH8804>, and will be no more angry <WH3707> <WH8799>.

Because thou hast not remembered <WH2142> <WH8804> the days <WH3117> of thy youth <WH5271>, but hast fretted <WH7264> <WH8799> me in all these things; behold <WH1887>, therefore I also will recompense <WH5414> <WH8804> thy way <WH1870> upon thine head <WH7218>, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>: and thou shalt not commit <WH6213> <WH8804> this lewdness <WH2154> above all thine abominations <WH8441>.
Behold, every one that useht proverbs <WH4911> <WH8802> shall use this proverb <WH4911> <WH8799> against thee, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, As is the mother <WH517>, so is her daughter <WH1323>.

Thou art thy mother's <WH517> daughter <WH1323>, that lotheth <WH1602> <WH8802> her husband <WH376> and her children <WH1121>; and thou art the sister <WH269> of thy sisters <WH269>, which lothed <WH1602> <WH8804> their husbands <WH582> and their children <WH1121>: your mother <WH517> was an Hittite <WH2850>, and your father <WH1> an Amorite <WH567>.

And thine elder <WH1419> sister <WH269> is SHomron <WH8111>, she and her daughters <WH1323> that dwell <WH3427> <WH8802> at thy left hand <WH8040>: and thy younger <WH6996> sister <WH269>, that dwelleth <WH3427> <WH8802> at thy right hand <WH3225>, is Sodom <WH5467> and her daughters <WH1323>.

Yet hast thou not walked <WH1980> <WH8804> after their ways <WH1870>, nor done <WH6213> <WH8804> after their abominations <WH8441>: but, as if that were a very <WH6985> little <WH4592> <WH6962> <WH8804> thing, thou wast corrupted <WH7843> <WH8686> more than they <WH2004> in all thy ways <WH1870>.

As I live <WH2416>, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>, Sodom <WH5467> thy sister <WH269> hath not done <WH6213> <WH8804>, she nor her daughters <WH1323>, as thou hast done <WH6213> <WH8804>, thou and thy daughters <WH1323>.

Behold, this was the iniquity <WH5771> of thy sister <WH269> Sodom <WH5467>, pride <WH1347>, fulness <WH7653> of bread <WH3899>, and abundance <WH7962> of idleness <WH8252> <WH8687> was in her and in her daughters <WH1323>, neither did she strengthen <WH2388> <WH8689> the hand <WH3027> of the poor <WH6041> and needy <WH34>.
And they were haughty <WH1361> <WH8799>, and committed <WH6213> <WH8799> abomination <WH8441> before <WH6440> me: therefore I took them away <WH5493> <WH8686> as I saw <WH7200> <WH8804> good.

Neither hath SHomron <WH8111> committed <WH2398> <WH8804> half <WH2677> of thy sins <WH2403>; but thou hast multiplied <WH7235> <WH8686> thine abominations <WH8441> more than they <WH2007>, and hast justified <WH6663> <WH8762> thy sisters <WH269> in all thine abominations <WH8441> which thou hast done <WH6213> <WH8804>.

Thou also, which hast judged <WH6419> <WH8765> thy sisters <WH269>, bear <WH5375> <WH8798> thine own shame <WH3639> for thy sins <WH2403> that thou hast committed more abominable <WH8581> <WH8689> than they <WH2004>: they are more righteous <WH6663> <WH8799> than thou: yea, be thou confounded <WH954> <WH8798> also, and bear <WH5375> <WH8798> thy shame <WH3639>, in that thou hast justified <WH6663> <WH8763> thy sisters <WH269>.

When I shall bring again <WH7725> <WH8804> their captivity <WH7622> <WH8675> <WH7622>, the captivity <WH7622> <WH8675> <WH7622> of Sodom <WH5467> and her daughters <WH1323>, and the captivity <WH7622> <WH8676> <WH7622> of SHomron <WH8111> and her daughters <WH1323>, then will I bring again the captivity <WH7622> <WH8675> <WH7622> of thy captives <WH7622> in the midst <WH8432> of them:

That thou mayest bear <WH5375> <WH8799> thine own shame <WH3639>, and mayest be confounded <WH3637> <WH8738> in all that thou hast done <WH6213> <WH8804>, in that thou art a comfort <WH5162> <WH8763> unto them.

When thy sisters <WH269>, Sodom <WH5467> and her daughters <WH1323>, shall return <WH7725> <WH8799> to their former estate <WH6927>, and SHomron <WH8111> and her daughters <WH1323> shall return <WH7725> <WH8799> to their former estate <WH6927>, then thou and thy daughters <WH1323> shall return <WH7725> <WH8799> to your former estate <WH6927>.
For thy sister <WH269> Sodom <WH5467> was not mentioned <WH8052> by thy mouth <WH6310> in the day <WH3117> of thy pride <WH1347>,

Before thy wickedness <WH7451> was discovered <WH1540> <WH8735>, as at the time <WH6256> of thy reproach <WH2781> of the daughters <WH1323> of Syria <WH758>, and all that are round about <WH5439> her, the daughters <WH1323> of the Philistines <WH6430>, which despise <WH7590> <WH8801> thee round about <WH5439>.
Thou hast borne <WH5375> <WH8804> thy lewdness <WH2154> and thine abominations <WH8441>, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH3068>.

For thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>; I will even deal <WH6213> <WH8804> with thee as thou hast done <WH6213> <WH8804>, which hast despised <WH959> <WH8804> the oath <WH423> in breaking <WH6565> <WH8687> the covenant <WH1285>.

Nevertheless I will remember <WH2142> <WH8804> my covenant <WH1285> with thee in the days <WH3117> of thy youth <WH5271>, and I will establish <WH6965> <WH8689> unto thee an everlasting <WH5769> covenant <WH1285>.

Then thou shalt remember <WH2142> <WH8804> thy ways <WH1870>, and be ashamed <WH3637> <WH8738>, when thou shalt receive <WH3947> <WH8800> thy sisters <WH269>, thine elder <WH1419> and thy younger <WH6996>: and I will give <WH5414> <WH8804> them unto thee for daughters <WH1323>, but not by thy covenant <WH1285>.
And I will establish <WH6965> <WH8689> my covenant <WH1285> with thee; and thou shalt know <WH3045> <WH8804> that I am the YY <WH3068>:

That thou mayest remember <WH2142> <WH8799>, and be confounded <WH954> <WH8804>, and never open <WH6610> thy mouth <WH6310> any more because <WH6440> of thy shame <WH3639>, when I am pacified <WH3722> <WH8763> toward thee for all that thou hast done <WH6213> <WH8804>, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>.
